diff_act: 7.prevent execution of functions beyond the permitted interaction level
8.alert the operator when attempting to execute functions at prohibited levels

regen.absent_element: description of how the system handles the case when the TCS software was halted due to an abnormal program termination but not due to a power interruption
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall enter the Recovery Startup Mode upon application of power if the TCS software was halted due to an abnormal program termination, regardless of whether it was caused by a power interruption or other factors.

label: The TCS shall inform the operator if the operator attempts to execute a function prohibited as a result of the determined level of interaction.
absence: Warning for execution of functions prohibited according to determined interaction levels
